Performance Improvements

  • Optimized Resource Usage: Significant reductions in CPU and RAM consumption through enhanced memory management and optimized image caching.
  • Smarter Background Operations: Resource-intensive tasks are now suspended when in fullscreen mode to maximize performance.

Fullscreen & Multi-Monitor Enhancements

  • Accurate Display Handling: Fullscreen detection now operates on a per-display basis, ensuring correct behavior in multi-monitor setups.
  • Improved Stability: Enhanced logic for handling fullscreen transitions and aggressive cleanup of orphaned panels to prevent visual glitches.
